attributes.action: address inconsistencies in nursing off duty rotas by commissioning the design of a software package
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will simplfy issues such as :

1. Staffing levels
2. Patient : staff ratios
3. Skill mix
4. Time owing
5. Ward administration duties
6. Calculating annual leave 

At present, this is undertaken by hand and, like the grading system, is a source of considerable conflict.
If nurse managers could type in - say, check boxes, with specific staff requests, this would be much easier - does the British govt have IT whizz kids capable of doing this ?
